ca.mcgill.ecse211.navigation

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.navigation.Navigation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlainNavigation, WaggleNavigation

    public abstract class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the general navigation related methods. Objects of this type also must implement a travelTo method that takes the robot to a specific location.
    Author:
    Matthew
